name: Blob The Miner
description:
A cool game i made for the Juicy Jam 5! Make sure to read the tutorial page before playing! All the upgrades in more detail: 1.  More turns: Gives you extra 3 turns each day. This has 3 different levels, so when maxed it gives you 9 extra turns. 2. Wallhacks: This one is pretty obvious. You can see all the blocks. 3. Iron pickaxe/Gold pickaxe: Iron: Mining stone doesn't take turns anymore.
To buy the gold version, you need to buy the iron one first!
Gold: Mining iron doesn't take turns anymore. 4. Shoes: When walking, there is 50% chance that you don't lose a turn. 5. Recycle: For every turn you spend, there is 10% chance of getting it back. 6. Huge flex: This doesn't do anything. You can consider you won the game when you buy this. Some reviews of the game:
"Great game! I would absolutely recommend it to everyone!"
- Developer
